DLY-TMAX-STDDEV.name: Long-term standard deviations of daily maximum temperature

DLY-SNWD-PCTALL-GE005WI.name: Probability of snow depth >= 5 inches for 29-day windows centered on each day of the year

DT32.name: Number days with minimum temperature less than or equal to 32.0 F

DTA.name: Digital Storm Total Accumulation(Storm Total Precipitation total (256 levels) with Dual Pol. algorithm)

MLY-DUTR-NORMAL.name: Long-term averages of monthly diurnal temperature range

DLY-PRCP-PCTALL-GE100HI.name: Probability of precipitation >= 1.00 inches for 29-day windows centered on each day of the year

ACMC.name: Average cloudiness midnight to midnight from 30-second ceilometer data

ACMH.name: Average cloudiness midnight to midnight from manual observations

DAPR.name: Number of days included in the multiday precipitation total (MDPR)

EMSN.name: Extreme maximum snowfall for the period.

DLY-DUTR-NORMAL.name: Long-term averages of daily diurnal temperature range

ACSH.name: Average cloudiness sunrise to sunset from manual observations

DLY-TMAX-NORMAL.name: Long-term averages of daily maximum temperature

EVAP.name: Evaporation of water from evaporation pan

DLY-TAVG-NORMAL.name: Long-term averages of daily average temperature

FMTM.name: Time of fastest mile or fastest 1-minute wind

DWPR.name: Number of days with non-zero precipitation included in multiday precipitation total (MDPR)

DAWM.name: Number of days included in the multiday wind movement (MDWM)

DP10.name: Number of days with greater than or equal to 1.0 inch of precipitation

DLY-HTDD-NORMAL.name: Long-term averages of daily heating degree days with base 65F

DASF.name: Number of days included in the multiday snow fall total (MDSF)

DLY-SNOW-PCTALL-GE010TI.name: Probability of snowfall >= 1.0 inches for 29-day windows centered on each day of the year
